overview:
The widest online service provider for the Filipinos. Pinoy business directory, Advertisements, Classifieds, Forum, Wishlist, Pinoy business list. \

Buy & Sell â€“ Classifieds â€“ Post your Ads Book your Flights, Hotels, Cars & Tour Passes Concerts, Sports, Theaters & Museums Tickets Pinoy Directory: Jumpstart your Online Presence. Advertise your business.

Bilmoko.com is affiliated with the largest, widest and most reputable online service providers offering our kababayans the convenience to find the products and services they need. Pinoys, here and abroad, can gain access to different sites providing specific services.

Here are the different categories included. Most, if not all services, have a worldwide coverage. You can search, compare prices and make a booking wherever you are.

  • Classifieds Free classifieds. Sell, buy, trade, discuss, organize, and meet people near you, wherever you may reside in the world.
  • Pinoy Directory Locate Pinoy-owned businesses in different countries. And support foreign- owned businesses in the Philippines. Register your business here so that Pinoys can locate you.
  • Car Rental Get the best deals on Car Rentals. Available cars in many countries!
  • Flight Booking Shop for discount travel. Book your local and international flights here!
  • Hotel Booking Over 71,000+ hotels in 71 countries. Book them here!
  • Sightseeing Tours Sightseeing tours, activities and things to do in more than 450 destinations worldwide, from Paris to Rome, New York to Sydney.
  • Event Tickets Ticketing services for leading arenas, stadiums, professional sports franchises and leagues, college sports teams, performing arts venues, museums, and theaters.
  • Insurance Get affordable health insurance quotes and compare individual health insurance plans side by side. Find individual health insurance, family medical insurance or small business health insurance and the best medical insurance plans for your needs and budget.
  • Course Finder Search for courses in your location and add the schedule to your calendar. Coming Soon!
  • Shopping Shop in US internet online sites and have it delivered to your door in Manila via Forex or Johnny Air Cargo. Popular Malls in the Philippines.
  • Cellphone Loads Buy your Prepaid Loads online. Gamecards. Internet and phone cards.
  • Balikbayan Box Door to door delivery. A household name of every Filipino in the US.
  • Flowers Delivers flowers around the world for all occassions.
  • Pasalubong Surprise your loved ones in the Philippines with gifts. Itâ€™s almost like coming home
  • Your Pictures in a Book Share lifeâ€™s special moments with a real photobook. A work of art which will be treasured for years to come
  • Jobs Search for Jobs.
  • Post Your Wishes Itâ€™s fun to share the stuff we like & get what we wished for! Share your bilmo-code with your friends.

We will strive to make it more and more convenient for you to shop for products and services. Weâ€™ll bring them all together in Bilmoko.com.
